data.title: Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education
data.meta_description: The Assessment Section manages test development, on-going test maintenance, and oversees the test administration for four statewide, large-scale assessments. The MAP assessments test students’ progress toward mastery of the Missouri Show-Me Standards.For more information, please see the Guide To The Missouri Assessment Program.
data.text:
2023-2024 Administration

• 11/08/23 - The training PowerPoint slides for Spring 2024 are now available.

2022-2023 Administration

• 04/06/23 - The 2022-2023 Guide To Interpreting Results is now available.

• 01/03/23 - DRC sent out a memo regarding the Spring 2023 MAP Grade-Level Summative Assessment.

• 09/16/22 - All MAP Grade-Level Assessment materials, including manuals and training are now available.

2021-2022 Administration

• 07/22/22 - DRC sent out a memo regarding Spring 2022 MAP Grade-Level Summative – DTC Reports Training Webinar Available in the Portal.

• 07/19/22 - The 2021-2022 Guide To Interpreting Results has been posted.

• 07/11/22 - DESE released an Administrative Memo regarding 2021-22 Assessment Data Posting & Data Corrections and Appeals Process

• 04/11/22 - DRC sent out a memo regarding Spring 2022 MAP Grade-Level Summative Optional Ordering of Printed ISRs and Student Labels.

• 04/06/22 - DRC sent out a memo regarding MAP Grade-Level Interactive Reports Data Removal.

• 04/01/22 - DRC sent out a memo regarding Update - DRC Workaround for iPads Running iPadOS v15.4.

• 03/30/22 - DRC sent out a memo regarding DRC Workaround for iPads Running iPadOS v15.4.

• 01/25/22 - DRC sent out a memo regarding Spring 2022 MAP Grade-Level Summative Assessments Enrollments Window Deadline.

• 01/05/22 - DRC sent out a memo regarding 2021–2022 MAP Grade-Level Assessments Trainings for DTCs.

• 01/03/22 - DRC sent out a memo regarding Spring 2022 MAP Grade-Level Summative Assessments Information.

• 10/04/21 - DRC sent out a memo regarding 2021-2022 MAP Grade-Level Practice Forms Information.

• 08/04/21 - DRC sent out a memo regarding Annual DRC Technology Updates.

• 06/15/21 - DRC sent out a memo regarding 21-22 Annual DRC Technology Updates.
